佋字的基本解释

佋
zhāo
古同“昭”。

佋
shào
古同“绍”。

佋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhāo］
［《廣韻》市昭切，平宵，禪。］
(1)同“昭”。
(2)见“佋僥”。
[②]［shào］
［《廣韻》市沼切，上小，禪。］
通“紹1”。

佋字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佋； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页98第05
【廣韻】【集韻】市沼切【韻會】【正韻】市召切，?音紹。介行也。通作紹。　又【正韻】時昭切，音韶。【說文】宗廟佋穆，父爲佋，南面。子爲穆，北面。今通作昭。

佋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
佋字的起名意思

同"昭"。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhāo］
["Guangyun" City Zhaoqi, Pingxiao, Zen. ]
(1) Same as "Zhao".
(2) See "fee".
[②]［shào］
["Guangyun" City Marsh Cut, Shangxiao, Zen. ]
Pass "Shao 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　佋; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 98 05
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] City Marsh Cut [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] City call cut,? Yin Shao. Intermediary bank also. Pass for Shao.　[Zheng Yun] Shi Zhao cuts, Yin Shao. [Said Wen] The ancestral temple is Dongmu, the father is Dong, south. The son is Mu, to the north. Today is clear.
